name: Pass The Light
description:
This is a prototype but it is still a playable game! In this game four players venture through a maze to find the treasure in the center of the map. There are 2 teams of 2 and each team shares one flashlight that they will have to pass to each other so make sure you communicate and share. To win you and your teammate must BOTH get to the treasure before the other team does (There is no win screen or popup). Have fun and explore! Also the collision is buggy so make sure not to touch any sharp edges.

Team 1 Controls:

Player 1: Use WASD to move

Player 2: Use GVBN to move

Use F to pass light

Team 2 Controls:

Player 1: Use 9IOP to move

Player 2: Use arrows to move

Use L to pass light
